# Intro

This is a python blob detection example for the MLX90640 and MLX90641.  
It is using opencv functions for the blob detection.


## Dependencies

- Python3
- mlx9064x-driver
- NumPy
- opencv

## Getting started

```sh
pip install mlx9064x-blob-detection
```

Run the demo.

```bash
mlx9064x_blob_detection <comport>
```
